fixes: Fixed a regression introduced in `1.5.1` where if the user leaves the waiting room without joining the meeting, an error was thrown
Performance optimization when fetching chat messages on room join
Fixed a regression introduced in `1.5.1` where if the user leaves the waiting room without joining the meeting, an error was thrown
Respect video / screenshare quality from preset
Sending file and images in private chat was failing due to a regression introduced in `1.4.0`
Detect and handle few more virtual devices
features: Added boolean flag `socketConnected` to `meeting.meta` that shows when the socket connection is established

fixes: **ðŸš¨ Critical ðŸš¨** Fixed a WebRTC video production bug that would impact *future* Chrome/Edge browser builds (version â‰¥ M111 - Scheduled to be released in the first week of March)
Fixed a regression introduced in `1.3.1` where defaults values passed during initialisation were not respected correctly under a certain edge case
Fixed an issue where a bluetooth device disconnection on Google Chrome did not automatically switch to an alternative device
Added workarounds for a [Safari Bug](https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=231787) where on disconnection of a bluetooth device, local video playback was paused
Fixed an issue with Safari screenshare, this improves the screenshare quality in Safari.
Minor improvement in the loading times of participant videos when joining a meeting with many participant on the Stage
features: Reduced the size impact of this library from from 1020KB to 880KB (from 228KB to 208KB GZipped). A 12% improvement from the previous release

fixes: Improve text legibility when screensharing on Chrome under poor network conditions

features: When Tab Sync is enabled, now a `selfTabUpdate` event is fired on the local user when the user switches a plugin

fixes: Improved handling of iphone Continuity on Mac OS
Fix issues in Websocket connection on Safari 12.x / 13.x / 14.x
features: **V2 REST API** - Supports `authToken` generated from V2 REST APIs
